concept.title: Introduction
concept.shortdesc: Lightweight DITA (LwDITA) is a simplified version of the Darwin Information Typing Architecture (DITA). In comparison to DITA 1.3, LwDITA has a smaller element type and attribute set, stricter content models, and a reduced feature set. LwDITA also defines mappings between XML, HTML5, and Markdown, enabling authoring, collaboration, and publishing across different markup languages.

note.p: Lightweight DITA is a work in progress. This committee note outlines the current plans in order to gain design clarity and receive feedback from potential users and implementers.
